game.name: The Walking Dead: Destinies
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: AMC의 The Walking Dead 역사의 흐름을 바꾸세요. 워커와 싸우고, 유명한 장면을 다시 체험하며 The Walking Dead 세계관의 운명을 바꾸세요. 여러분의 선택이 영웅과 악당, 산 자와 죽은 자를 나눕니다. 릭과 같은 결정을 내리시겠어요? 안이면 나만의 길을 개척하시겠어요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Change the course of AMC’s The Walking Dead history. Fight walkers, relive iconic moments, and change the destiny of The Walking Dead Universe as your choices separate heroes from villains, and the living from the dead. Will you make the same choices as Rick, or will you forge your own path?

reviewHighlights.text: I 100% this game in less than 10 hours, not worth 40 dollars. Buy it on a steam key site for 3 bucks. You need my DNA. So like a blood transfusion? Yo...
